## Location\_2 interface

The latitude and longitude of the user making the request. Used to bias the results.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Location 
```

## Remarks

If omitted from a request, Yext will attempt to determine the location.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [latitude](./answers-core.location_2.latitude.md) | string | Latitude formatted as a decimal degree number. |
|  [longitude](./answers-core.location_2.longitude.md) | string | Longitude formatted as a decimal degree number. |
